title: panca nadIsha
sahitya:
panca nadIsha pAhimAm bhayAnIca sarvEsha


anupallavi

  sancita karma shamana carAcara pAlana dhUriNa


caraNam    dArukA vana vihAra dakSAdhvara hara catura vIrabhadra janaka venkaTEsha mOdakara
sUra samhAra kumAra janaka praNavArtha svarUpa shrIkaNThamudita hrdayAravinda sadAnanda
